title: Ruby Red Slippers
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; add vodka, orange-flavored liqueur, amaretto liqueur, lime juice, and sugar. Cover shaker and shake. Strain drink into 2 martini glasses; add enough cranberry juice to fill glass 2/3-full. Pour 1 teaspoon raspberry-flavored liqueur into each drink and top with champagne.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers orange-flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau)
2 fluid ounces cranberry juice, or as needed
2 fluid ounces champagne, or as needed
